highlights.description: Initial release with WebSocket gateway, AI agent runtime, and unified messaging via omnichat

added.description: WebSocket gateway with client management and health checks
AI agent runtime with omnillm multi-provider support (OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini)
Unified messaging via omnichat (WhatsApp, Telegram, Discord)
WhatsApp provider with QR code linking
Tool execution loop with max 5 iterations
Shell execution tool with allowlist security
Cobra-based CLI with gateway, channels, config, and version commands
YAML/JSON configuration with environment variable overrides

fixed.description: Pin fetchup to v0.2.3 for go-rod/rod v0.116.2 compatibility
Nil interface gotcha for observability hook when disabled
